0.text: Bug 2418  [UI] Status line messgae remains after fastview is closed (1GF1RPI).

1.text: TM (6/9/2001 11:39:21) 	SDK 121  	1) I was catching up with changes.

2.text: I do this in a fastview of the "synchronize" view in the java 		perspective.

3.text: 2) when I was done, I clicked the fastview icon on the left workspace window border.

4.text: 3) the fastview closed  	4) observe: I still could see the status line message fromt he synchronize view (No conflicts, ...)  NOTES:  SA (10/10/2001 2:23:44 PM) 	This problem is still here in 0.202 build.

5.text: It can be reproduced with any views.

6.text: Once the fast view 	is hidden, no other view/editor is given focus.

7.text: This should be fixed in the bigger context of proper focus & z-order handling.

8.text: That is, focus 	should go to the pevious part that had focus.
